attributes.title: Patient and valued partner

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: The ability to source reviews through their programs at our pace and comfort level. Our G2 Crowd reps provide us with education, options and understand our deliberative pace. They nudge, but they don't push or pressure to jump into strategies we're not ready to implement.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Lack of permissioning options. It would be nice to be able to authorize certain members of our management and support teams to respond to reviews without giving them access to all of the admin dashboard. It would be nice if we also had the option to respond as the company instead of individuals.

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value: Be sure you understand how other review or software evaluation sites calculate their scores, rankings and/or ratings.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Verifiable users and feedback. There are several software review and marketing sites out there but G2 Crowd does a great job in verifying that reviewers are real users even if the reviewer doesn't disclose their identity. It definitely gives us more confident in the feedback we receive. Also, the ability to gather leads and see data about who is considering our solution is extremely valuable data intelligence to our digital marketing team.

attributes.title: Great team, premium service

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: Flexibility when adapting to each client. G2 Crowd has "out of the box" packages that should be enough to cover software companies needs. However, if you talk with your assigned team about the peculiarities of your business, they will do whatever possible to adapt their services to you. With increidble motivation and skill.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The platform lacks multi-language support and is too much USA oriented. Software market is global and even when most of activities are ok being in English, there are a lot of reviewers out there that feel more comfortable writing something as personal as a review in their own language. On the other hand, G2 Crowd is struggling to get on the top (if it hasn't already) of the Software Review credibility and reputation score table. They do effords commuincating their platform to the USA market and USA software consumers, that efford would be welcome in other languages and countries too.

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value: Explain your whole business to the team when implementing the service.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Accurate social valoration of our software. The fact that G2 Crowd reviews are validated before being published and that come from real users allows us to differenciate from the late crazy race on getting paid reviews or reviews from low-trust sources seen in other platforms.

attributes.title: Great marketing intelligence platform that's growing fast

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: Flexibility to adapt to our goals & needs. The G2 Crowd team has taken the time & effort to talk to us, understand how we can get the best value out of their platform and give us options that work well with the goals and needs of our business. Although their price points for the different offerings have gone up significantly over the past year, we have been able to get options that fit within our budget. The platform is easy to administer and manage (with an automatic integration to Salesforce that works great for us). The review process is straightforward for our users to follow and the G2 Crowd team is again very helpful in working with us to facilitate review outreach campaigns.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Some of the more advanced offerings pitched to us at different times were not fully baked and required manual integrations to have them set up. Also, I think customers can benefit from finer filtering criteria and better validation of contact info in the lead generation offerings (for instance, occasionally last names or phone numbers are incomplete or missing from leads that get passed to us).

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 Crowd is the review platform of choice for our customers to share their experiences with our company & product.  We also use G2 Crowd for marketing intelligence & competitive analysis in our space and for lead generation. The quality of leads from G2 Crowd is high as it is based on some level of evaluation/buying intent.

attributes.title: Seems like there's a lot of potential here

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: Great analytics on the backend was unexpected. Also, they have really exceptional account reps and sales reps. I wasn't expecting the level of expertise and care I experienced. They also have some really amazing reports to help buyers compare rival software systems and the fact that every review is checked against the users LinkedIn account + a screenshot of them brings the review to a higher level of credibility.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The user interface is a little too cluttered. There seem to be some issues visual hierarchy. This makes it difficult for one to quickly understand the great reports they have to offer which is a shame. Also, this is minor, but the "chat here" option appears to often. It is common to have a chat icon in the bottom right of the screen but it's also repeated in several other areas of the site which makes the site feel to cluttered and too "salesy". I honestly believe more people would visit g2 if the user interface felt less cluttered.

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value: Get at least 10 reviews on G2 before you purchase because your company won't come up in any of the reports until you get at least 10. Also, if you get 25 reviews then you come up in more reports so if you're on the fence just get 10-25 reviews before you decide.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
Helps us get the word out about our company by putting reviews in the public space. We can also see traffic trends, for example, we can see which competing software system is most often compared with our own. 


PS. I don't know which product I have. When I login, it says "Premium branding plus" but my options in the review don't allow me to pick that so a lot of my answers are "n/a".

attributes.title: G2 Crowd is Awesome

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
I love the awareness G2 Crowd offers for our product. If someone is simply searching on Google for a CRM system, G2 Crowd pops up and offers all these products with REAL customer reviews. I think that is extremely valuable to both shoppers and companies. G2 Crowd gets hundreds to thousands of people scrolling through their site daily, which offers a great amount of awareness to our product.

One other thing I HAVE to praise is the G2 Crowd staff. Bliss Billingsley was incredibly helpful throughout our training/implementation phase and was always quick to email or call when I had questions. Just last week she transitioned us along to Ashley McDermott, our Relationship Manager. While I'm sad to no longer work with Bliss, I'm equally as excited to work with Ashley and improve our ranking even more!

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
The only complaint I have is that they sent the review emails to our customers back to back. G2 Crowd sends 3 emails to notify your customers to leave reviews and earn gift cards, but I was really hoping we'd be offered the chance to choose the dates of these emails. They sent all 3 emails back to back over a 3 day period, which in my opinion wasn't enough space between emails. Maybe just give customers the option in the future of when to send the emails.
*Disclaimer: I may have had the option to choose and just forgot/didn't realize it...

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value: If you're looking to drive awareness for your product, work with G2 Crowd!

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: We are a very small company and while we are known in our vertical market that we specialize in, we are NOT known anywhere else. Since we've started this campaign with G2 Crowd, our product has moved from Page 5 to the bottom of Page 3. Page 1, here we come!

The vendor portal is very user friendly, and our account manager, George, has been helpful every step of the way. We recently launched a new review campaign, called G2 Gives, and we are excited by the idea of incentivizing customers and reviews with charity donations. 

Overall, G2 Crowd has already brought great value to our company and we are looking to expand the use of it over time.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: There are so many useful features  there is not much to dislike.  And I think the vision and roadmap can take G2 to even broader value for us.  I guess the most difficult part is change management on our side  i.e. how do we get our teams to more habitually use the G2 features and information in all of our internal sales, marketing, support, and product processes.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: There is nothing more powerful or credible than first-hand experience from a real customer.  Our biggest benefit is the ability to utilize the customers voice to tell our story and articulate our value.  We also get the benefit of users telling us directly where we can improve, so it serves as a great input to our product and support organizations.

With the program now up and running for a few months, almost a year actually, we are now also realizing that while there is value in driving clicks and leads from this space it actually is also a strong way to identify who is actively comparing vendors in the market and including or NOT including us in that search. love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
We really enjoy the G2 Crowd Grid that displays ClockShark alongside other similar time tracking software. Not only is it easy to see how our position changes as we collect more reviews, but this Grid can be embedded in marketing pages to provide leads with a real-time grid view. 

We also really love working with the team at G2 Crowd. Danny took extreme care to understand our company needs and expectations, and even sent us a signed "thank-you" note after our first webinar. (Who does this? Uhm...Danny does!) Our implementation specialist Kelly slowly and meticulously explained how to get our listing set-up. She transformed a super daunting job into very easy subtasks, and weekly met with us to review our progress. It was like eating an elephant, one bite at a time...but with less mandible engagement. Ashley, our main point of contact at G2 Crowd, has overseen our entire G2 Crowd journey, and is quick to resolve any concerns we have. Like, greased lightning fast!

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: I have no complaints about the product, staff, or service at G2 Crowd. One observation is that G2 Crowd prizes quality reviews, and there can sometimes be a delay between review date and the day it posts to your account. Don't wig out: It's TOTALLY normal! They will carefully vet all reviews to make sure they are being submitted by actual software users. Fake news, fake reviews, Pokemon -- the team at G2 Crowd catches it all.

recommendations.text: Recommendations to others considering the product:
recommendations.value: G2 Crowd goes above and beyond to make sure you are fully acquainted with their platform. Be sure to be open and transparent with your business needs so they can make the proper recommendation for you.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
We've witnessed increased quality in the reviews of our customers. It's also very easy to contact reviewers through the G2 Crowd portal if you want to follow up with them. 

We enjoy a steady flow of new leads who have encountered us on G2 Crowd in their search for a time tracking software. It's easy to track all leads using G2 Crowd's leads portal.

attributes.title: Great social proof, great support.

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
In addition to helping us differentiate our products from our competitors, G2 Crowd provides authentic, trusted social proof for buyers researching products. If a consumer searches for reviews of our products, G2C is the first thing they see. The badges, Grid and reference pages are great for sales enablement. 

Our EAM and CSM are amazing and always quick to respond, jump on a call, or meet with our stakeholders to ensure we're getting the most out of our subscription. They're willing to do some leg work for us whenever needed (I ask a lot of questions and tend to be a bit of a squeaky wheel).

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
Sometimes the algorithm will prioritize reviews that are neither recent or the most helpful, because they're verified or lengthy, but doesn't take context into consideration. 

Major increase in subscription price this year, but comes with a lot more functionality and tools to leverage (that we're still getting acquainted with).  High cost for SMBs, but so valuable.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 Crowd has helped us position and differentiate our products in a very crowded and volatile industry, as well as given us insight to our customer's journey. We're looking forward to leveraging the new features available to us to generate SQLs and better enable our sales team to leverage the social proof G2 provides.

attributes.title: G2Crowd Buyer Intent Signals Created Pipeline for us

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value:
Metadata has experienced phenomenal success with buyer intent data from G2Crowd. The way we operationalize the data is two ways:

1 - Outbound emailing particular personas within accounts visiting our page/category section, using the attributes provided by G2Crowd as a way to personalize the email.

2 - Execute account-based advertising campaigns (using metadata.io), targeting the right personas within those exact accounts with personalized content.

Within the first month of running these operations, metadata.io has generated a clear ROI for our investment that revived a lost opportunity into CLOSED WON opportunity, closed an additional new new deal (6-figure deal), and generated dozens of opt-in leads/conversions from those accounts visiting our category page, our competitors page or our own page on G2Crowd. All from the first month.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The process of pushing the accounts from G2Crowd to an automated advertising campaign via social and programmatic channels is done with CSV files, but it's solvable using Zapier. Would be happy to see an integration between the two solutions, as well as others (e.g. outreach.io)

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
- Know who is currently looking for our kind of solution
- See if existing customers are shopping around for other vendors and proactively preparing for it
- Automatically targeting high propensity to buy prospects with targeted advertising

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: I like the fact G2 Crowd is disrupting the old, stale way of running market evaluations of solutions. They crowdsource it from the users which is what I believe buyers are looking for throughout their purchase decision. As a sales rep, I can leverage the voice of our customer to address questions, objections, and similar initiatives with our active sales cycles. In a world of SaaS solutions, the voice of the customer is paramount. What I like best is the unique access to engage with prospects that are in a research phase by providing unfiltered perspective from our customers.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Not much to dislike technically. I would be interested in getting more analytics on which reviews visitor traffic is reading most.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: I love the fact that we can intersect buyers in their research phase of a solution. The days of cold emails/cold calls are dwindling. We need rapid traction in the market and having the ability for our voice of the customer to influence their research phase is critical for developing qualified leads and shorter sales cycles. The conversion rates on connecting with companies actively researching our type of solution has been a game changer. "fish where the fish are"

attributes.title: Awesome and Effective Solution for Review Generation

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: Love how turn-key things have been thus far, as well as the attitude of the G2 crowd team (shoutout Mike, Pete, and Walter). These guys are on top of it. We just finished up our first review campaign and more than doubled our number of reviews (80+ new reviews), which we can now use to inform new product features and make improvements all around going into the new year. Best partit was wildly simple to set up and launch.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: G2 Crowd obviously has a strong interestlike any tech companyin ensuring we become heavily integrated within their platform and remain customers for the foreseeable future. A few times that's come across just a little too strong, at least to our liking (lots of communications and calls to set up integrations we don't necessarily need on our end at the moment). Not really a deal breaker but we're a small, bootstrapped team that just needs a bit of consideration for what we can do at a reasonable pace. Other than that, not much to dislike about this platform and their team.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 plays an essential role in creating stellar-looking-and-sounding reviews for our testimonial marketing efforts, which has become the most effective part of our marketing strategy over the last year and will continue to be in 2019.
